semantic_identifier: [GOLD-39]: Backfill messaging experiment outcome metrics using canonical stage mapping
title: Backfill messaging experiment outcome metrics using canonical stage mapping

sections.text: Recompute historical win rate, pipeline velocity, and conversion metrics for existing messaging experiments after the new canonical stage/event normalization is in place. Implement a backfill job (idempotent) to re-aggregate outcomes from normalized funnel stages and overwrite/versions the stored experiment outcome snapshots. Validate that metrics match pre-normalization expectations on a small set of known experiments and do not regress for newly created experiments.
